text: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ

translation.en.sahih: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.
translation.id.indonesian: Bagaimanakah mereka dapat menerima peringatan, padahal telah datang kepada mereka seorang rasul yang memberi penjelasan,
